adudecalledleo.lionutils.serialize

Class GsonObjectFormat

  • java.lang.Object
    • adudecalledleo.lionutils.serialize.GsonObjectFormat
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ObjectFormat

    public final class GsonObjectFormat
extends java.lang.Object
implements ObjectFormat
    ObjectFormat that delegates reading and writing to a Gson instance.
    Since:
    4.0.0
